entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon.
